text:
Hi !! Thank you so much, it sounds like a great idea !! And i went through the website and it looks awesome !! There is a lot of really cool inspiring concepts ! Thank you so much !!

And yeah ! I can see the pictures !! I understand what you mean now !! I'll make sure to practice some black and white paintings and hopefully ill send them to your for some feedback !! :) 

Ummm what about angles, like painting from a high angle point or low angle, do you have any tips for that ?? 

Happy new year by the way, may this new decade bless you with health and happiness ! :)
